MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 9:15PM in the LL53 postcode areas of Pwllheli affecting properties in Caernarvon Road and surrounding streets. This is due to safety concerns on the underground cable network . This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:18PM on 20th November 2020.
